title: Google Chrome’s password manager is working on the ability to ‘send’ passwords
content:
Google has given its password manager a lot more attention in recent months, and things just keep evolving. Coming soon, it seems Google Chrome is adding the ability to “send” passwords.

more…

The post Google Chrome’s password manager is working on the ability to ‘send’ passwords appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Chrome appears to be working on a new "send password" feature for its built-in password manager, but its use is unclear.
